protein.specific_function: In presence of calcium ions, it binds to surfactant phospholipids and contributes to lower the surface tension at the air-liquid interface in the alveoli of the mammalian lung and is essential for normal respiration

reference.reference_text: White RT, Damm D, Miller J, Spratt K, Schilling J, Hawgood S, Benson B, Cordell B: Isolation and characterization of the human pulmonary surfactant apoprotein gene. Nature. 1985 Sep 26-Oct 2;317(6035):361-3.
